entry.title: Ukraine Seeks to Squeeze Russian Troops as It Girds for Battle for Kherson
entry.content: Kyiv is building forces outside Kherson, even as larger battles continue in the eastern region of Donbas, under a strategy that suggests growing confidence.

entry.title: Europe's Key Rivers Fall to Critical Levels, Aggravating Energy Crunch
entry.content: Scorching temperatures have drained some of Europe’s main rivers, threatening to disrupt vital economic thoroughfares and exacerbate the continent’s energy shortage.

entry.title: Covid-19 Variants Keep Getting More Contagious. Here's Why.
entry.content: Scientists say new virus variants are evolving to be better at evading our immune systems’ existing defenses.
